title: Create or update a note
description: Creates or updates the note on a listing.
permission_required: MyTradeMeWrite: Maintain your watchlist, answer questions and post comments.

fields.name: Text
fields.description: The text to display in the note. Cannot be empty.

fields.name: ListingId
fields.description: The ID of the listing to associate the note with.

fields.name: NoteId
fields.description: The ID of the note. Can be omitted when creating a note.

fields.name: OfferId
fields.description: The ID of the fixed price offer to associate the note with. Can be omitted if the note is not associated with a fixed price offer.

fields.name: PurchaseId
fields.description: The ID of the Purchase to associate the note with (such as a won or sold item). Can be omitted if the note is not associated with a Purchase.

returns.description: <NoteResponse> Whether the operation was successful and the note details.

fields.name: Success
fields.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: The description of the error, if the operation failed.

fields.name: OfferId
fields.description: The ID of the fixed price offer, or 0 if the note is not associated with a fixed price offer.
